document.full_text: the washington post apologized to an arizona daily newspaper on wednesday after a two-time pulitzer-prize winning reporter plagiarized coverage of accused tucson gunman jared loughner.
document.title: washington post apologizes for plagiarism
lines_and_colors: the washington post apologized to an arizona daily newspaper on wednesday after a two-time pulitzer-prize winning reporter plagiarized coverage of accused tucson gunman jared loughner.
